message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraint, but I'm still willing to work with you. Considering the value of the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $130.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the flexibility, I would like to stick to my original budget. Could we possibly meet at $120?
